item.description:
The NERDY CABARET is an audience-driven theatrical experiment in the fine art of geekdom; hipsters are encouraged to sport their fake wide-rimmed glasses, lab technicians spontaneously strip down to inflammable lingerie, and after-work-didn’t-have-time-to-change ensembles can pass as kinky. Nerdy science jokes, political sattire, deconstructive hip-hop story-telling, and sexy role-play involving inanimate objects are encouraged here. Enter at your own risk.

This month's theme -- Bonding, Breakups, and "Bad" Relationships is all about the chemical reactions that drive Bonding, the pseudo-psychology of Breakups, and the political effects of Bad Relationships on the nerd's social environment.

DRESS THEME (Optional, But Encouraged): Audience, this is serious business. If this event were to be considered an "UnWedding", a "Beakup Celebration", a "Divorce Party", or an "Ode to the Exes",  what would you wear? (no weapons allowed inside Middle East, unfortunately)

ADMISSION: Sign up for the $8 Guest List (or pre-purchase your ticket). Otherwise, $10 at the Door.

 

ONLINE TICKETING: 
http://nerdycabaretoctober2011.eventbrite.com/
 

Follow Spectra Events and The Nerdy Cabaret on Twitter! @spectrasevents (note the extra "s" after spectra)

Use the hashtag #nerdycabaret to tweet all your nerdy thoughts to Spectra and Idalia, they always return the love.
item.name: The NERDY CABARET IV: Bonding, Breakups, and "Bad" Relationships
